item.description:
Let's return to Union, to take advantage of one of the best tasting brunch deals in Boston. It's the early riser special for $9.95. Check out Union Brunch menu for the early riser special as well as a la carte options.

Driving and MBTA direction to Union

MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route.

DRIVING DIRECTIONS: Check out Google to plan your route

PARKING: You should find free parking at meters along Washington Street...they're free on Sundays.

 

Before I list the Reservation Rules, please understand the NO-SHOW policy was established to ensure everyone who wants to join can and it will be fairly and strictly enforced. I want to assure you I do understand if you've RSVPd YES and on the day of our meal you have a sudden change of plans because you're lost, you don't feel well or you have transportation issues. My only request is you MUST let me know as soon as possible so we don't worry about you and our reservation is adjusted. As long as you contact me you will not be considered a NO-SHOW.

Rules for Events with Reservations:

If it is less than twenty-four hours from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you MUST call at (617) 445-7549      .

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVPs are on a first reply, first secure spot basis

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment.

If the meal is full and you wish to attend, please select WAIT LIST RSVP. When a spot opens, your RSVP will be changed to YES based on the time of your WAIT LIST RSVP and if you answered the RSVP question.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the meal and you have not attended nor contacted me, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If I change your RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update meal confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW each will count as if you've NO-SHOWED.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the reservation, it is counted as a NO-SHOW if you do not contact me.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events with reservations you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so please, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.

I will arrive at 10:15 AM to welcome you from Union's bar at the entrance.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call my cell (617) 445 7549 DO NOT TEXT

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Union Brunch Sunday May 6th 10:30 AM
